game.name: Corewave Defenders
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Mining & Tower Defense! Build miners to gather ores, buy diverse cores, and freely assemble your own defense towers from modules! Your strategy and creativity forge the ultimate frontier against endless enemies!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mining & Tower Defense! Build miners to gather ores, buy diverse cores, and freely assemble your own defense towers from modules! Your strategy and creativity forge the ultimate frontier against endless enemies!
